website_summaries.verdict: This attractive thermos takes top marks for its superior insulation, a stainless steel inner lid, and a versatile design that works for children of all ages.
pros: Triple insulated thermal technology maintains temperatures for longer, keeping contents hot for up to 6 hours or cold for 12
Interior is constructed entirely of stainless steel, ensuring hot foods never come in contact with plastic
Textured lid is easy to open and 100% leak-proof

customer_reviews.title: Great size for hot lunches
customer_reviews.text: We have the 8 oz container but bought this one for variety. It is much better for packing pasta and other non-liquid hot foods. It will keep food hot/warm for several hours if heated properly. I once opened the container after eight hours and the contents were still very warm.
customer_reviews.author: K. David

customer_reviews.title: Best thermos ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to take dinner to school with her on days when she has late practice. I pack her dinner at 7:00 a.m. and it is still warm at 6:00 p.m. In the test I did, the food was still at 150 degrees after 12 1/2 hours. To get best results, fill the thermos with boiling water and let it sit for 15 minutes before dumping the water and filling with food. I've been sending food that has a high liquid content (soup, chili), so I don't know how solid food would fair. My daughter is quite happy with the her dinners, so I feel like this was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BeanMom

customer_reviews.title: No plastic inside the lid!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thermos! It keeps her lunch warm for the five hours between leaving for school and lunchtime. We bought this to replace a Thermos brand food jar that had the worst odor from the plastic inside the lid. This food jar doesn't have any plastic that touches the food and the gasket is easy to remove and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten must have
customer_reviews.text: Love the No Plastic packaging. Will update on the keep warm food.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermos. I have a couple of this size and a couple larger ones. Best feature-it's dishwasher safe. Seal removes easily for thorough cleaning and no plastic touches your food. Worst feature-it can 'over seal' when putting super hot food in and makes it difficult to open. It might be nice if the lid and jar were a little more 'grippy' for opening. Overall a great container
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the 12oz and loved them! We have been using them for months now and it does commit to keeping our food hot for hours. My husband even forgot his lunch only to discover that it was still hot during supper. Definitely recommended. I have bee looking for a thermal food container with a metal cover and these did not disappoint, although a bit pricey. I will order again should their 16oz be shipping to Singapore. It would also be awesome of they sell parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm food warm for atleast 4 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter takes this to lunch on a regular basis and her soup or taco meat or whatever I've put in it is warm by 12pm lunch, 4 hours after I've packed it. A must have for those days where school lunch isn't all that appealing;)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps food hot/cold and is easy for my 2.5-year-old to open.
customer_reviews.author: Misa

customer_reviews.title: This container is working great and a nice volume
customer_reviews.text: This container is working great and a nice volume. It's a little on the tall side, but I haven't gotten any complaints from my child about difficulty eating from it. The tall container is easier for me to pack in a lunch bag and I like that the lid is smaller (in diameter). It's easier for smaller hands to grip and open (myself included). I also like the grey/neutral color as it can be used by anyone in my family without (adult, child, etc) for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Audge

customer_reviews.title: BEST THERMOS!! DURABLE AND LOVE THE COLORS!
customer_reviews.text: As it is - we are a Lunchbots family. This thermos is great because the top is wide and is very convenient. It keeps the food pipping hot. I put boiled water inside while preparing the food to go in and it works even better! My daughter loved this and since the colors match the Gators - she will be taking it to college with her! The best part is that even though the top is plastic - no plastic touches the food! It is also very durable - I dropped it by accident and it was fine - not even a dent! Highly recommend another great Lunchbots product!
customer_reviews.author: BaumMom

customer_reviews.title: This thermos is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work lunches. I cannot believe how long it holds the heat. I heat my soup at 4:30 am and when I have lunch at 11:30 am there is literally still steam coming off my food. I can't begin to tell you how great this thermos is. I would have never thought it would have kept my food so hot for so long. This is well worth the money and is so convenient not needing to waste time in heating up my lunch in the café not to mention it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Melody LaBarge

customer_reviews.title: Thermos Cap breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lunch box for the kids as this was the only thermos where the inside of the cap was metallic (no plastic). However the cap is not durable. Just one fall broke the cap and it’s not usable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Sinha

customer_reviews.title: hot lunch that stays hot
customer_reviews.text: My son likes to take a hot lunch. This fits a hot dog or leftover bbq or pasta or a can of soup perfectly. I fill with boiling water to heat it up then fill with heated food. It's still hot hours later.
customer_reviews.author: mcqtt

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot or cold
customer_reviews.text: It has worked great. Keeps lunch hot! I also made a cold smoothie to take to work. I started drinking it only about an hour or so later, but it was frosty cold. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L.

customer_reviews.title: Great option for meals on the go
customer_reviews.text: Love having an insulated food container without any plastic touching my food. Decent size for children and adults. Keeps food warm or cold as needed. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Food stays hot! Perfect little thermos!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter to take her lunch in. She mainly takes hot food in it and she says it’s still hot when she eats it. She usually takes soup or pasta. It’s fits perfectly in her lunch box. It’s easy to clean. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francine Guardi

customer_reviews.title: Second to None!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love LunchBots. Bought a few of your containers years ago and they are all still in use almost every day. Hard enough to find a retailer to ship to Ireland and as a result I have bought other brands and regretted it. Very glad to have been able to get this beautiful flask delivered to me and I will most definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Young

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I normally have overnight cold oatmeal. But my mom had put a hot oatmeal early in the morning. I didn't realize until I opened to eat it. It was like 5 hours and the food was hot. Not piping hot but surprisingly hot. This is worth buying for my use. I will try with soups later. But easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: love the sizes ,shaoes,colors,,,it kept my drink hot for 3 hrs than warm for 3 hrs more!
customer_reviews.author: agatha harchuck

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and the size is just perfect
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this to pack hot lunches for our 1st-grader. Looks great, and the size is just perfect; lots of similar options are 10oz or 8oz, which is a bit too small for us. Superb customer service! We accidentally broke the lid and emailed customer support; they responded in a couple of hours and sent us a new lid.
customer_reviews.author: mig29

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Fill it with hot water and let it sit for 10 or 15 minutes to warm it, then add your heated soup or whatever and it stays hot for at least 5 hours. I bought the 12 oz size and it holds the perfect amount for lunches at work. It is easy to open and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: BP me

customer_reviews.title: Works great and worth the money easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my daughter to bring hot lunch to kindergarten because she is a picky eater and it is a total game changer ! Shipped fast and secure easy to wash easy to use and my daughter can open it ! What a great purchase looks great and holds up is very sturdy too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby food
customer_reviews.text: It is an expensive buy, but worth it. Has been thorugh dishwasher 100 times now, been using it daily. Prepare food in the morning, still hot for lunch. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jernej K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the best thing for me is that it is so easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos for school or work!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My boys don’t particularly like sandwiches so they have taken leftover pasta, soup, and rice with chicken to school. Everything stays warm for them.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I take it to work and it keeps the food warm for several hours. I’m able to eat my dinner without reheating. Very good product!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Dishwasher safe, so easy to keep very clean. I bought two, and will likely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot for 4-5 hours in winter.Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter.I pack for her by 7am in the morning and she says the food is still hot during her lunch time which is around 12.30pm.Very happy with the purchase.Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: I always worry if these containers will actually keep food ...
customer_reviews.text: I always worry if these containers will actually keep food hot. However, in the east coast winter my husbands lunch was still hot at lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's in daily use by our kids and still 100% perfect
customer_reviews.author: Robert O.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use: my kids, including my 10 years old can handle it. Easy to clean. Keep food really warm for at least 6 hours ( I did not try longer than that). Really leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot food hot longer than ones we had
customer_reviews.text: My kids are thrilled this keeps their hot lunches hot!! We threw out our old thermos character ones after one day of using this new one.
customer_reviews.author: DAJ322

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Food Warm For 6 Hours
customer_reviews.text: This container has kept food warm for my 8 year old for up to six hours and I love that it's dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Cari Hall

customer_reviews.title: !This is a good thermos
customer_reviews.text: This thermos works really well. I have only used it for hot foods and it keeps the food hot for a long time. I always heat the food until it's like boiling. Then I put it in the thermos at around 6am. My son doesn't eat lunch until 1pm and he says his pasta, nacho meat with melted cheese and black beans and rice is still warm when he eats lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Vsheabelle

customer_reviews.title: This item is the perfect size and keeps food warm - even when placed ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is the perfect size and keeps food warm - even when placed in a cooler with an ice pack. The follow up email with the instructions for conditioning was a nice show of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Kept my son's cereal/soup /porridge hot from Morning drop-off to the evening pick up from his Day care. I could feed him left over at home. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid's lunch boxes.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said her mac n cheese was still warm at lunchtime. Fits well in her lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: T. Trifiletti

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Food Hot
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with how this container holds in heat. I ate soup about 5 hours after packing my lunch and it was still pretty hot. No more plastic for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature of food will be maintained
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money, can be used by kindergarten child to grandparents. No leaks or spills & keeps the temperature of food just right.
customer_reviews.author: jeff snow

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: It really keep my lunch warm for a long time. I love it. It was so good that I had to buy a new one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot as described, and most importantly it ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food hot as described, and most importantly it does not leak! My son has had 3 food containers this year that have all leaked. Worth the money! Thanks LunchBots!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Finley

customer_reviews.title: This thermos is wonderful. Keeps lunch hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is wonderful. Keeps lunch hot for hours. Leftover food is warm when my child gets home from school. I put boiling water in it first and then make sure the food is hot. So glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food warm or hot for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sending hot soups and chef boy-ar-dee to school for my son
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food warm for hours.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's lunch. He didn't eat his pasta at school one day, when I opened the container by 6pm, pasta was still warm.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: Super thing for kids who loves to eat fresh homemade food in School.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and it works the way it is. Food is fresh and hot after hours.
customer_reviews.author: SANTOSHKUMAR

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter to take to school everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to take to school everyday. Wanted a thermos that can be put in the dishwasher. This does the job. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: marc kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my son's soup very hot. He said it was almost too hot to eat at lunch. He also found the container much easier to open than the Thermos brand one he had before this. He used to have to ask the lunch aid to open who usually have to get a custodian to crack the seal. His lunch period was over before he even started to eat. So for a kid that looooveeeessss soup this has been a great purchase and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids lunches warm and easy to open
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different once and this one is the best, it really keeps the kids lunches warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: keeps warm as promised
customer_reviews.text: This keeps the lunch warm for five hours. Easy to clean. Doesn't leak
customer_reviews.author: Kris W

customer_reviews.title: Works and doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: Holds food warm and hasn't leaked. My kid is very happy to be able to eat some of his favorite home-cooked soups and pastas for lunch at school.
customer_reviews.author: Christine brisson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Entirely stainless steel interior! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: A Lim

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps food HOT for over 6 hours! Just follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, keeps food hot for 4-5 hours
customer_reviews.text: Like the mostly metal construction. Leak proof. Use it for hot lunches almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: AKK

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal container
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has had a Th__mos bottle for the past 6 months of school the plastic liner cracked so we thought we would give LunchBots a try. The bottle is great, easy to open and does keep the food hot. Love the ability to throw in the dishwasher. Will by a second as our daughter loves hot lunches and can give her another entrée (soup and pasta)
customer_reviews.author: MrWonderfull

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product....compact, easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as Thermos products that I've used in the past
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as Thermos products that I've used in the past! I purchased these because they are larger than the kids standard Thermos containers. Wish I hadn't wasted my money. Even if I fill them with HOT water and let them stand before putting in hot food, the kids say their food is not even warm by lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Benita Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's been great for my son at lunch time
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different containers before settling on this one. It's been great for my son at lunch time. I boil water in the morning and let it sit in the container before warming up his food and putting it in. My son says his food is still warm at Noon and I pack his lunch around 7 a.m. This has been great!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. My boys absolutely love the ones I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My boys absolutely love the ones I bought for them. They keep their lunch warm and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Stays got and stays cold
customer_reviews.text: Work fantastic for keeping food hot. I put hot water I thermos first To get the temp up. Works great for sending soup for lunch staying warm easily for 4-5 hours. Lid closes easy which is a huge plus and really easy for cleaning! I am super satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Guess

customer_reviews.title: Retains heat. Sharp edge.
customer_reviews.text: Retains heat. I could tell there's a connecting line at the bottom of the thermal. Could be better lined. The edge of the rim is very sharp. Be careful when washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat.mommy

customer_reviews.title: Best thermos I have ever bought for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Best thermos I have ever bought for my kids. Easy for them to get the lid off and on. NO messes in their lunch box ever. Easy to clean. And the food stays really hot. I have 3 other thermoses that collect dust in my cupboard now. I recommend this to all of my mom friends!
customer_reviews.author: Christine W.

customer_reviews.title: Useless if They Forget the Seal Gasket
customer_reviews.text: This might be a lovely thermos. However, it arrived without the seal in the lid, so I can't use it and will never know.
customer_reviews.author: Springfield

customer_reviews.title: Best thermos I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best thermos I've ever used! After 5 hours in the thermos, my son told me that his soup was still too hot to eat! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Like hot or cold foods?  Lunchbots are the answer!
customer_reviews.text: Love my lunchbots! Keeps what I need hot and what I want cold. I am very picky. I want my soups hot. My husband is amazed that these work so well. I even bought the bigger sized ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food stayed hot after almost 8 hours!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to pick up my son from school early so he didn’t get to eat his lunch. I heated the container with boiling water for about 10 minutes. I put freshly cooked pasta in the container around 5:45am. My son ate the pasta at 1:15pm at home and the food was still hot. I thought maybe it would be warm or cool, but no, it was hot and perfect temperature for him to eat! Now I know it works and that he’s not eating cold or lukewarm food for lunch which is around 11-11:30am. Update: I went to empty the container at 3:45pm, and the pasta was still warm!! That’s 10 hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my soup nice and hot for when I'm at work. You can't fill it to the top or it will spill over when you put the cap on. I made that mistake the first time I used it but I love that it isn't made of plastic and that I don't have to use a microwave to heat it up at work! If you have a bigger appetite then you may need 2 of these since they are likely the size of 1 bowl of soup which has worked just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nutrition Addict

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't keep foods hot like I was expecting after reading the reviews. I pack my son's lunch about 6:30am and he eats at 11:00am and the food has not been barely lukewarm. I even tried it with my lunch one day to make sure my son's impressions were accurate. I've been doing what was suggested by other reviewers--boiling water and letting it sit in thermos for about five minutes to heat the thermos before putting the food in.
customer_reviews.author: Jen328

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: All stainless outside instead of an attached plastic base makes for easier cleaning and nowhere for nastiness to hide when the glued on plastic base inevitably starts to separate. Metal on the inside of the lid Is another positive for cleaning. Holds content to temp for hours.
customer_reviews.author: flowynn

customer_reviews.title: Planning to buy more
customer_reviews.text: I am using this air-tight canister to store coffee beans for my AirBnB, after one guest took a whole pound when he left after a one-night stay. It works well for rationing, keeping the beans very fresh, and looks great on the coffee bar. I now plan to buy some for lunches to go.
customer_reviews.author: linds

customer_reviews.title: Seals well yet easy to open
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this almost weekly for the kid's lunch. 3 months in and we both love it. 1) easy of cleaning in dishwasher 2) retains heat well 3) and most importantly... It's easy to open. We have encountered other brands that was a nightmare to open when it cools.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open. Keeps food warm, nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food warm for several hours, not as hot as when first added. I usually add boiling water and then remove same before adding contents to keep food temp a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: l m miller

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: love anything lunchbot. my son uses these everyday so that he has warm food for lunch. bought because I dont like hot food and plastic touching and this has no plastic touching the food!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Holds the heat as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This container holds the heat perfectly. I heat the container with hot water while I'm heating my son's lunch at 6:30am. He eats at noon and tells me his lunch is still hot. PERFECT! Returned the "Funtainer" because this one was better.
customer_reviews.author: njdaisy86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school lunch
customer_reviews.text: These never leak and keep my son's lunch warm. Super easy to clean - just throw in the dishwasher. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: dmoutsop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, wide mouth, keeps food warm for hours.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide mouth for my kid, grippy thermos for small hands, keeps the food warm for hours, nice bright colours, got the 12oz and this is ample size for a 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Quality questionable
customer_reviews.text: Quality questionable This product cracked when fell on the ground. It was not thrown but just DroppeD Would like a replacement or refund but my return window closed. I got about 3-4 months use out of this item
customer_reviews.author: A. c. C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hot food thermos
customer_reviews.text: Great product - doesn’t leak! Plus it actually keeps my kid’s lunch warm, and is the right size and shape. Also good price, fast shipping. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: E. K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with quality
customer_reviews.text: Provides a great tool to send hot lunch options to school. My son says food stays warm. I’m starting to dig Lunch Bots. Hopefully they remain a trusted brand as I’m just getting started with the sending lunch to school process. So far, so good. Wish products were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Put boiling water in for a few minutes then hot soup. Warm for about 5 hours
customer_reviews.author: search for quality

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal container for school
customer_reviews.text: This container is phenomenal for keeping food warm, especially if your kids have to bring their own.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm
customer_reviews.text: Stays warm longer than the other brand we used. Plus the part of the cap that touches the food is stainless steel, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: This container is the perfect size for my 5th graders lunch kit
customer_reviews.text: This container is the perfect size for my 5th graders lunch kit. It kept the food nice and warm from 7:15am this morning until 11:40am. My daughter said it was great, just like it was barely cooked. It was worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gossett

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic on the lid contact with food.
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my 9 and 5 years, keeps lunch warm for hours. The best thing I like is only silicon and stainless steel contact with food.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda. L

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you pack food its a must! Food stays warm & if you leave a outside two inches off of the top, it won’t spill.
customer_reviews.author: J Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Lunch stays hot for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I am packing lunch for my 6 year old daughter in this lunch box. I pack at 7.30 am and her lunch is at 12 pm(4.5hrs). Food stays very hot it seems. She is liking it. It's better for liquid and semisolid food items because of narrow mouth. I think, Wide mouth one will be good to fit Solid food items. It's little heavy to keep it in the back pack. So, my daughter carries the lunch bag in her hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jaya

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel lines the lid! ;-)
customer_reviews.text: Even the inside of the lid is lined with stainless steel, so no politic comes in contact with the food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermos!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermos. It keeps food warm for hours and it's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Aryanfard

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first school year using these and both of my kids say their lunches are hot when they get to eat 4 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing thermos!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little thermos! I send my husbands lunch with him in the morning, and fill thermos about 8am with soup, chili or today, leftover Thai food. It keeps all hot TIL noon-1 pm. I do prep it with boiling water. Have not tried cold items yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyq

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are everything we hoped they would be. They keep food very hot for 6 hours. My kids use them everyday. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep food hot.
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and did lots of online research. This container gets warm on the outside when hot soups are added to the inside. It doesn’t retain the heat and my daughter’s foods are lukewarm by lunchtime 4 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This thermal really keeps food cold and warm as advertised. A co-worker told me about lunchbots and I was a bit skeptical because of the price but I see it's worth it. I may buy a smaller one for my kiddo to take warm soup to school that will still be safe and warm by lunch time. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and wide enough opening to eat from ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food warm until lunch time. Easy to clean and wide enough opening to eat from easily

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Vsry nice product and very easy to clean. Just wish it kept food warmer iver longer periods.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband. He's happy with the item. Keeps his lunch hot.

customer_reviews.title: well insulated, does the job with style
customer_reviews.text: keeps food cold or heat for several hours; easy for adult hands to open, slightly trickier for kids hands

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little stainless steal thermal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, hot stays hot all day! Cold stays cold all day!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this little thermos. keeps food really hot. Just the right size for hot lunch.
customer_reviews.author: mary c

customer_reviews.title: OoOo that smell~
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea and has supplied me with hot soup hours later. only thing I would change is the lid with all that plastic it soaks in smells pretty good. I can still smell the onion from chili from a while ago or maybe it's like a cast iron pan just needs to season lol, But if you can look past that its great for nice hot soup during the lunch or supper time, perfect serving size too. most times I get two servings out of one fill up if its hearty soup
customer_reviews.author: Irves

product_meta.title: LunchBots Thermal 12 oz Triple Insulated Food Container - Hot 6 Hours or Cold 12 Hours - Leak Proof Thermos Soup Jar - All Stainless Interior - Royal
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR INSULATION: We developed our triple-insulated Thermal technology to keep food at just the right temperature! Our insulated Thermal food containers stay cold for up to 12 hours or hot for over 6 hours. We’re so confident in our 12oz Thermal that we guarantee it will outperform a product of the same capacity from any other brand.

ALL STAINLESS STEEL INTERIOR: Enjoy a hot cup of soup without your food touching plastic! The Thermal’s interior, including the lid, is made of durable 18/8 stainless steel. Dishwasher safe for a no-hassle cleanup.

PERFECT SIZE: At a convenient 1.5 cup size, the Thermal serves up a perfectly portioned side of soup! Its 3” diameter is ideal for little hands and makes it easy to eat directly from the container. At 5” high, it goes great with the LunchBots Uno, Duo, Trio, Quad, Cinco and Pico containers and fits in our Duplex thermal lunch bag.

LEAK PROOF DESIGN: When you have a hectic schedule, you need a food jar that can keep up! Completely leak proof, the Thermal is a must-have for grab-and-go mornings. You can drop it in your purse, briefcase or backpack without the worry of accidental spills or messes.

TRUSTED BRAND: Jacqueline Linder designed the original LunchBots stainless steel food container over 10 years ago to pack school lunches for her two young boys. We’re a family business, run by Jacqueline and her husband Ben in California. We’re dedicated to creating the highest quality bento lunch boxes for kids and adults. LunchBots containers last a lifetime and our customer service team is always here to help!
